scripts.postinstall: npm --prefix frontend install && npm --prefix backend install
scripts.build: npm run --prefix frontend build && npm run --prefix backend build
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run copy-bundle-to-backend
scripts.start-dev-database-and-server: echo "WARNING: This option uses an unsafe development database and is not production ready!" && concurrently -n database,database "npm run --prefix database dev" "npm run --prefix backend start"
scripts.dev: concurrently -n frontend,database,backend -c magenta,yellow,green "npm run --prefix frontend dev" "npm run --prefix database dev" "npm run --prefix backend dev"
scripts.dev:watch: concurrently -n frontend,database,backend -c magenta,yellow,green "npm run --prefix frontend dev:watch" "npm run --prefix database dev" "npm run --prefix backend dev:watch"
